content:
## n8n@1.59.0 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@1.58.1...n8n@1.59.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2024-09-11 /// warning | Chat Trigger If you are using the Chat Trigger in "Embedded Chat" mode, with authentication turned on, you could see errors connecting to n8n if the authentication on the sending/embedded side is mis-configured. /// This release contains bug fixes and feature enhancements. For full release details, refer to [Releases](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/releases) on GitHub.
